page.title: 13TRIANGLE VALVE
page.content: {Triangle Valve}is a major employer in the area.The company was formed in March 1948 in Manchester.It was originally called Triangle Products Ltd. and employed 100 workers.Now,in 1985, 280 people are employed by the firm.Most of the employees are local people.The company run apprenticeship training,Y.T.S and Y.O.P. schemes.Work is carried out to very high standards. Computers are used extensively by the company.They handle accounts,wages, costings and planning for the future. The valves produced by the firm are exported all over the world.One major contract was the supply of equipment for the Alaska oil pipeline in the U.S.A.
